mapper.select: SELECT U.UPLOAD_NO, U.TITLE, U.CONTENT, U.CREATE_DATE, U.MODIFY_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTACH A WHERE U.UPLOAD_NO = A.UPLOAD_NO) AS ATTACH_CNT FROM UPLOAD U ORDER BY U.UPLOAD_NO DESC LIMIT #{begin}, #{recordPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UPLOAD (TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO ATTACH (PATH, ORIGIN, FILESYSTEM, DOWNLOAD_CNT, HAS_THUMBNAIL, UPLOAD_NO) VALUES (#{path}, #{origin}, #{filesystem}, 0, #{hasThumbnail}, #{uploadNo})
mapper.select: SELECT ATTACH_NO, PATH, ORIGIN, FILESYSTEM, DOWNLOAD_CNT, HAS_THUMBNAIL, UPLOAD_NO FROM ATTACH WHERE PATH = CONCAT('/storage', DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y/%m/%d'))
